import React from 'react' import getDate from "../GetDate/GetDate" import Comment from "../Comments/Comment" import CommentDisplay from "../CommentDisplay/CommentDisplay" import VideoList from "../VideoList/VideoList" import "../../App.scss" import "../MainVideoDisplay/MainVideoDisplay.scss" import Like from "../../assets/Icons/Icon-likes.svg" import Views from "../../assets/Icons/Icon-views.svg" function mainEntry(props) { if (props.entry===null){ return "" } return ( <>

{props.entry.title}

By {props.entry.channel}

{getDate(props.entry.timestamp)} ago

{props.entry.views}

{props.entry.likes}

{props.entry.description}

{props.entry.comments.length} Comments

{/* Section created solely for styling the Desktop layout purposes as content in the VideoList component. I tried using position absolute however I couldnt get the layout to stop jumping around, so i used display none :) */}

NEXT VIDEO

{props.videoDetail.map((video) => {return ( (video.id!==props.entry.id) ?
  • {video.title}
  • {video.channel}
: ("") ) })}
) } export default mainEntry
